description: This file contains implementations of various cryptographic functions related to Transport Layer Security (TLS), including RSA encryption/decryption, signing, verification, and support for DSA signing and verification. It implements public key operations by interacting with underlying crypto modules and manages key-specific procedures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt_RSA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_pub_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs RSA encryption using a provided public key, interacting with underlying crypto module.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt_RSA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_prv_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs RSA decryption using a provided private key.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoSign(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG key_type,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_sig,PULONG o_sig_size)
methods.description: Generates a digital signature (RSA or DSA) based on key type.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoSign_RSA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_sig,PULONG o_sig_size)
methods.description: Signs data using RSA private key by invoking underlying crypto request with private key parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoSign_DSA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_sig,PULONG o_sig_size)
methods.description: Signs data using DSA private key.

methods.name: BOOL TlsCpoVerify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG key_type,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * i_sig,ULONG i_sig_size)
methods.description: Verifies a digital signature (RSA or DSA) based on key type.

methods.name: BOOL TlsCpoVerify_RSA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * i_sig,ULONG i_sig_size)
methods.description: Verifies RSA signature by decrypting with RSA public key and comparing with original data.

methods.name: BOOL TlsCpoVerify_DSA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * i_key,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * i_sig,ULONG i_sig_size)
methods.description: Verifies DSA signature using DSA public key.
